website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, comprehensive set that comes with everything cornhole enthusiasts need. The best on the market.
pros: Rugged, festive boards with sturdy aluminum construction, 8 weather-resistant cornhole bags, and a well-made carrying case
cons: Some users say that the boards are a bit low
The bags have a tendency to slide off the slick surface

customer_reviews.title: yet very sturdy. The surface is a bit slick
customer_reviews.text: Light and portable, yet very sturdy. The surface is a bit slick, bags had a tendency to slide down off the surface. I put strips of black duct tape on the board to add a little texture and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Too slick to play
customer_reviews.text: The positive side is they are very light and portable, they are not regulation size but I knew that going in and just wanted a set for the camper but the coating on them is so slick the bags slide off or slide down to the bottom. So as not to have a complete waste of money I am going to try doing a grit clear coat. Had I know how slick they are I would have never bought them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Almost impossible to play on this poorly designed board
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst cornhole set I have ever used. The top of the game board is covered in a plastic lacquer that when you toss the bag, it slides off of it as if it were a slip n slide. The other terrible flaw in this set is that the game board surface has a huge springboard effect. When you toss a bag and use any loft in your shot, it bounces off of the board like a trampoline. It is nearly impossible to score points on this board unless you swish it through the center. I will say that it is constructed well and fold up easily, but that is the only positive to this set
customer_reviews.author: Bret Fair

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at. Can't play.
customer_reviews.text: I have to wonder if the people reviewing this game have ever played cornhole before. Definitely seems fishy. The good: it's an attractive design. The aluminum folding legs are sturdy. LEDs are a cool touch. The bad: it's completely unplayable. The surface of the boards are so springy that everything bounces off. The boards are so slick that if you happen to get something to land, it'll slide off the front the next time someone hits the board. Bags are too light as well and the zipper to the case fell off literally the first time I used it. Returning this ASAP. For the price, it's complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Product as displayed
customer_reviews.text: The American flag is properly displayed on this model, unlike the others that I've seen advertised on Amazon. The aluminum makes them light weight to carry, but seem sturdy enough not to move around during play. No issue with the bags, though, they haven't seen a lot of use yet. Only issue I had, I was unable to unzip the carry case when it arrived as the zipper was completely stuck, then broke while using pliers to get it unstuck. I contacted GoSports, as their paperwork requested, emailed a copy of my invoice and promptly received a replacement carry case, at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Berlin

customer_reviews.title: NIce portable cornhole set
customer_reviews.text: Yes its on 3x2 and yes they are light, but that's why I like them. Can carry them with my pinky. So easy to setup and move around. I have another official set that is all wood and I play a lot more now because these are so easy to move around. The bags bounce a lot if you play on pavement but if you put these in the grass not too bad and there is some nice slide action. If you are serious about corn hole I suppose these are not for you, but I love this for portability and easy setup - YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R Carlucci

customer_reviews.title: Game fell apart from getting wet
customer_reviews.text: Being an outside toy we assumed it could stay outside. It got rained on once and fell apart. It only lasted a week from when it arrived. Terrible quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Cornhole Set
customer_reviews.text: Received this set as a Christmas gift and it has served me so well over the last 4 years. Sure those painted and stained wood boards you see are beautiful, but they must weigh TWICE if not more what these weigh. It's so easy to pack these boards and travel with them. They are extremely sturdy and still look brand new (really they do!) as the day I got them four years ago. The travel bag isnt the most durable, but it has yet to rip on me. If you need a set of boards to travel with, or to set up a few times a summer, these are perfect. Don't hesitate to grab these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: K.P. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Love it, With a Minor Exception
customer_reviews.text: I really love this set. Its ability to fit in the carrying case creates an option to quite easily take it on the road without using up all your cargo space. The bags are high quality, the boards are quick to set up, and the lights are a great addition at dusk. My only reservation is that the bags bounce/slide off the board a bit too easily for my taste. So I solved that by adding some strategically placed strips of anti-slip tape -- now the game play is more fun, as scoring is somewhat more frequent.
customer_reviews.author: Scott from Aurora, CO

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I chose it mainly for the lightness of the boards & the LED's for night play. The boards are extremely sturdy & well-built. The LED's function great at night. The board plays well - just the right amount of grab with the bags. The bags are also of high quality. Of note, one of the boards were damaged in route. I contacted the seller directly, who responded that same day & sent out a new board. 5 star service - thank you Danielle @ P&P Imports!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Burdell

customer_reviews.title: Fundamentally Flawed
customer_reviews.text: We received our set with a dent in the metal frame and a broken case. The support was great, they sent out replacement items quickly. However this set has two fundamental flaws that cannot be fixed. It is too bouncy and it is too slick. The beanbags either bounce off of slide off. Those are your two options besides it going right into the hole. It makes playing extremely frustrating when compared to other corn hole sets. Best to avoid this set unless you want to be frustrated AND out a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Synergy Sales

customer_reviews.title: It's better to spend money for a better quality made corn hole game
customer_reviews.text: Just received this... It is portable... Not sure how weatherproof it is.... Cheap made.... The platform is extremely bouncy and going to have to reinforce the sturdiness by putting 3/4" plywood on the bottom of it... For now, seriously disappointed. Review update: We decided to just return this set rather than trying to modify it to make it sturdier... Filing for the return was easy. Will drop the package off at UPS today.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Hux

customer_reviews.title: Board way too slick.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for a friend who loves cornhole but didn't have his own set, Everything is great with them, except the board itself is much too slick. There were way more 3 pointers than one pointers, getting a bag to actually stay on the board is basically impossible. I found this quite disappointing because otherwise they seemed very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie Jacot

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great and accepted my return d/t having a damaged set. But this was a blessing, b/c in no way, shape or form is this close to a wooden set you can have made from someone on Craigslist for the same price. They bounce like crazy and move all over. Smaller than regulation and very fast surface. LED's on any boards are no more than a gimmick, b/c you are still playing in the dark. They are light and mobile, but with that you are getting a half-@ss set.
customer_reviews.author: Jethro Jonz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice game for all the family! Easy to carry, well yes and no because it is not light and not small. But it is nice to have the bag to carry it and to protect and put it. I was disappointed because after few games I have to sew one bag because there was a hole in there. The quality of the sews could be better.
customer_reviews.author: laure93320

customer_reviews.title: This particular set doesn't really allow for that very easily.
customer_reviews.text: The panel is not very solid, has some flex to it which causes the bean bags to bounce quite a bit. It certainly adds another level to the game. I rated 3-stars because I was looking for the original type game in which you can slide the bags in. This particular set doesn't really allow for that very easily.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for tailgating
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these as wedding gifts for friends. I was thoroughly impressed that this came with batteries. Not only that but it comes with instructions on different methods to play, official rules and scoring. But just to one up just coming with instructions. The instructions are laminated. It shows that this company really thought about their target audience. This is perfect for tailgating, backyard picnics, parties and a summer time necessity. Next step I guess will be buying one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: M Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased & comes with a storage bag
customer_reviews.text: When I received my order 1 of the backside of the boards was cracked. I submitted pictures to Go Sports and they sent a replacement board out by FedEx. We have only used it a few times but the boards seem to be sturdy and the design is pretty. Very easy to store or take with you by having the storage bag. I do not keep ours out in the weather. We just put back in storage bag after each use
customer_reviews.author: Kristie E.

customer_reviews.title: Worst cornhole ever
customer_reviews.text: I dislike how the board are so flexible because their aluminum the bag bounces way too high when it lands. It's pretty much tended useless. I tried to return it but was past my 30 days. Horrible product in my opinion and I spoke to the company they wouldn't issue me a refund and let me return it either. So money wasted now. I'm such a happy customer and feel great about my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying, I've never played Corn Hole before buying this item. I did a lot of research, and apparently there are tons of options out there... with prices getting very expensive. I chose this based on the price and the fact that it's portable. I'm glad I did. The build and quality is great, this is not a piece of junk. And I appreciate that it comes with it's own carrying bag, which is perfect for storing in the garage once it gets cold out. As for the game itself, it's fun! Much more entertaining than I was expecting it to be... Good times!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good looking,quality made !
customer_reviews.text: Quality set ! Would be nice if boards hooked together without having to use carrying bag but other than that I loved everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: GREG GRISSOM

customer_reviews.title: Very Entertaining Game
customer_reviews.text: I've used this set several times and have really enjoyed it. The set seems well built and the aluminum will work well in a sometimes wet environment of the Pacific Northwest. It's a little work to get everything back in the soft case but the case makes storing and carrying the set around very easy. I think this set will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M

customer_reviews.title: The bags that came with it are nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: The game is of decent quality. When it arrived, the box had a hole in it, and one of the boards had been damaged, but we kept the game anyway. I'm sure it happened during shipping, and not a fault of the company. We have used the game several times, and have taken it to use on the beach. It has held up well, and I'm sure it will last for years to come. The bags that came with it are nice and durable. They have gotten wet, but has not affected the quality of the product. We keep it stored in the carrying case that came with the game. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, convenient too.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Cornhole set for my Dad this Xmas and helped set it up for him. I was worried it would be cheap construction, but it was really solid. In fact, a bunch of keys kept stepping on it even though we told them not to, but the boards did not even bend. The outer metal rim looks good and feels solid. The bags themselves are solid as well. I love how this set can be wrapped up easily for storage and transportation with the included bag. I'm not an experienced corn hole player, so I can't vouch for the performance of these boards, but my family had a great time with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Johansen

customer_reviews.title: game is made pretty well
customer_reviews.text: we play corn hole most every day. This is the second game we have purchased from GoSports. They have no quality control In one of the game the bags weigh 10 oz and the other a full pound. I checked the rules and they should weigh between 14-16.5 oz's
customer_reviews.author: JERRY C

customer_reviews.title: Cornhole
customer_reviews.text: This set makes the game a little challenging being metal instead of wood. But holds great and used regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought from the warehouse and these look brand new. Very happy with the material they are made of as well as how sturdy they feel. Overall very happy with these, now on to see how they will weather.
customer_reviews.author: R.Ferda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport and store
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our parents and it's had a good bit of use. We love how it folds up into its carrying case and is light to carry. We got the light-up version and it is nice for twilight play (full on darkness is tricky, but possible). The surface is a little more slick than wooden versions I've used. Also, please note that it isn't "regulation size."
customer_reviews.author: EmiWhoAmI

customer_reviews.title: Great CornHole Game
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews about various CornHole games we felt this Go Pong Bean Bag toss set was worth a try. Glad we made the choice. We love the game and really like the quality. It is well built, easy to set up and very sturdy. Living in the FL Keys our outdoor games have to survive in warm, salt air environment this is perfect for us. This set is made to last. The is a nice carrying/storage bag to keep it in. The bags are well constructed, colorful and we like that they are weather proof. I would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Diver

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite happy to have a set
customer_reviews.text: As expected, can't play these on cement as the boards bounce and slide. Bags do tend to slide and bounce a little more, but again, the bounce may be due to the cement we played on. No grassy area around in my neighborhood that isn't crawling with mosquitoes =( but overall, I'm quite happy to have a set! And they fit in the bag perfectly for storage
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described we love this set it was perfect for our Fourth of July party
customer_reviews.author: JMJJKHatch145

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light and love the carrying bag. They can be pound if placed on hard prop surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: sohrab

customer_reviews.title: Bumber!
customer_reviews.text: This is very light and bounces when u throw the bags on it. It came 3 days late and the zipper on bag was broken and the LED battery attached to the back of the board had fallen off. Very disappointed as it was a Father's Day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review on strorage bag.
customer_reviews.text: For shipping purposes, it was well wrapped up. A box shippied over its original box. No damage to the game or any of its pieces. As for the carry on bag that is used to store the game , no so good quality. One zipper broke off as I took the game out of the bag. Then as I put the game back onto the bag, zipper two broke off as well. The bag it self no so strong.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER W DUROLEK

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son's birthday. The boards are lightweight but sturdy. The carry case was damaged in packaging. The one Zipper pull was bent and as a result the zipper in non functional. I am going to try and have the case replaced without having to send the entire box back. I don't think my son is going to stand for that!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LED's quick working shortly after purchase
customer_reviews.text: This looked awesome at night, however the LED's on half of the circle quit working after a few days of use. We ended up keeping it, because it works fine during the day. However considering that I paid close to $120 for this item, the LED's should be higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These board are a cool design but they are flimsy. The bean bags bounce off when they hit. We bought the LED lights to put around the holes and the screws shake loose because of the flimsiness of the board. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight! (perhaps to a fault)
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and how lightweight this set is! It's super easy to transport in its custom case and the lightweight design. The one downfall, if any, is that because its so light, the beanbags tend to bounce off of the board (especially on grass). It still seems durable, but it affects game play. I am thinking that weighting the legs down with bricks or sand bags should help (but this also detracts from the benefit of being lightweight)
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: It's nicely packaged in it's own carrying case
customer_reviews.text: This is really, really well done. It's nicely packaged in it's own carrying case, small enough to travel with and large enough to feel like a regulation wood set (it's one foot shorter, but that makes it easier to travel with). The bean bags don't slide off the platform, and land and stick the same way I expected them to as if this were a wood set. Both of the field day games I've purchased from GoSports have exceeded my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Recorder guy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: having the case makes it easy to store and transport. Very sturdy would but other products from them!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Its very good and could easily be great!
customer_reviews.text: since it is light weight aluminum it needed one more set of underside "ribs" so it doesn't bow from constant bean bags landing on it's light frame top. We added a set because we really liked this set. This is more of a R & D comment so this great product can be improved upon. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: riveroak

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for father's day. Used it right away. It was easy to carry and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Ive

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Husband
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my husband. He has been asking for a regulated version of cornhole and loves this set. NFL is is favorites sport and he loves the look of the boards. The material is very sturdy as well as the bags. The carry bag seems a lilltle thin and I can see it breaking after a while.
customer_reviews.author: NYCSRQ

customer_reviews.title: Too lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I like the carry bag and that this comes with nice bean bags. It's a nice set for the price. However, it is incredibly lightweight, which means the boards will bounce when a bean bag hits one. This makes your game a little different from what it should be. We are thinking about glueing wood scraps to the underside to weigh the boards down while still being able to store the bean bags inside when it's packed away.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn Watson

customer_reviews.title: Get a wood board instead
customer_reviews.text: I kinda feel bad giving this product a bad review, as it arrived as advertised and does look nice. However the thin aluminum board causes the bags to bounce off on most throws, and although my friends and I are not playing professionally (heck, we're pretty much amateurs) it is very frustrating and its rare anyone wants to play a second game. I've played on cheaper plastic boards that had much less bounce. I plan on buying a wood board and suggest you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Barb the Barista

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Used at our daughter's wedding and was a big hit with all! Especially after dark when we lit them up! Super fast shipping and well worth the very reasonable cost. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Patti

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The boards bounce WAY too much. The bags will bounce right off of the board and the boards themselves move. The lighting is poorly attached to the boards as both fell off the first night we had the boards out. The boards are light weight which is nice and the bags do not slide as much as I thought given the boards are not made out of wood. The lights look neat until they broke.... I returned these boards after the 1st use. If you like playing corn hole, don't buy these. If you want something easy to carry around that looks neat, consider buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sovesky

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game to use for our family in our backyard and to take to the beach. I know its not waterproof and we were careful not to get it wet, but after only 3 weeks of use, the board completely disintegrated while playing! It was kept in the storage bag it came in inside while not in use too. I am very disappointed in the poor quality of this product and have requested a full refund from the manufacturer as I was told my window to return the item already closed after 5 weeks from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: They love it. They played with it in the house
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for 7 year old twins who played a similar game at my house. They love it. They played with it in the house, since it was still too cold to play outside in February in CT. It's also portable with it's own carrying case and Mom plans to take it to other parties. Would recommend this one since it's more sturday than most I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product that is made well and gives us much enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: W.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy enough for my 13 and 4 year old grandsons to play outdoors. Even the adults like it too. Love the case it came with to store it in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie W.

customer_reviews.title: We like the game
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun. Dhoni thing I can tell you is a little bit too light and too slippery. The being Bags could be filled just a little bit more. They can be set up almost anywhere and it's a lot of fun really is.
customer_reviews.author: Debedeb

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: All right, so I just started playing corn hole this summer. Our neighbors had it at their house and it was a blast. For some reason my husband decided that he needed to buy me a corn hole set. So he bought this set for me. It is definitely not like my neighbors professional, lit up, Beautiful set that they use for their annual tournaments. But it serves it's purpose. It is on the lighter sideand it can kind of move around a little bit. I'm not sure if that's how it's supposed to be all the time anyways. For our purposes it works and it's entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Seeclear

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Surface is very slick. Hard time keeping the bean bags on it. Even when you land them, they slide down to the bottom some times or mostly right off the top. I had to add a few strips of anti-slip stair tape to slow down the bags. Well built and good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: wiseguy6768

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: We wanted cornhole boards for parties, but we didn't want to pay a ton for them. We're certainly not pros. These fit the bill perfectly and cost a lot less than most other options.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S

customer_reviews.title: Great CornHole Game for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This CornHole game is great and very durable. Great Price and heavy duty beanbags with a nice carrying case in event you want to take your CornHole tailgating or to a friend's house! I would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: I had a sticker company print my husbands company logo on them and they look great! I have used them for multiple parties and ..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about 6 months ago for a private party I was having for a business dinner. I had a sticker company print my husbands company logo on them and they look great! I have used them for multiple parties and they are a great icebreaker! Lots of fun, easy to set up and easy to play. The bags zip and keep the bean bags all stored together and they store flat.
customer_reviews.author: Kyles

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, but they are not the regular size.
customer_reviews.author: ileana rosa

customer_reviews.title: Tailgate Approved
customer_reviews.text: Lets just make one thing clear, the portability of this CornHole set makes life so much easier. Had the chance to break this in while tailgating at the UCLA football game last weekend and received many compliments. PROS: Portable, lightweight, very good quality, inexpensive. CONS: none. Bags were double-stitched, which held up very well and did not slide off the board like some other sets I have used in the past. I strongly recommend this product! I received this product in return for an honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bontty

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Whole Family!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this quickly. Easy to open and set up. My boyfriend and I played games with by brother, his wife, my 2 nephews and even my mom got in on the fun for a few tosses!!! Made our Memorial Day cookout that much more fun. Did have a problem with some of the bean bags coming apart at the seams. Contacted the company and they agreed to send an entire set to replace the few that came apart. Very good customer service -- very easy to deal with and pleasant. Good value for the money. Can't beat it when you make two boys (12 and 16) happy and a 67 year old granny laugh and have fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: TKay

customer_reviews.title: Carrying case, sturdy designed boards, heavy bean bags, Worth It...!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, the carrying case is really Awsome... These boards are a bit springy, but I like the challenge... This is a great starter set, The Bean Bags are nice n heavy, to me that is very important... I purchased the Red and Blue set... Ya its definitely worth the price...!!! Just so you know I am far from a pro like on ESPN LOL...!!! Not even close...!!!
customer_reviews.author: KEITH SECOR

customer_reviews.title: LED Light was non functional within minutes
customer_reviews.text: The LED light was not functional within minutes of opening the box and engaging in a game. I noticed it when a beanbag landed on the cornhole table, it started flickering and eventually went out. It was discouraging when I contacted the company about this, I received a return email that it was non-existent. I will continue to find a contact to obtain a replacement light in hopes that I won't have to do a complete return.
customer_reviews.author: Shanay w

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loved this game! The kids thought the “light up hole” was cool!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: small boards with lots of bounce.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say I regret this purchase. These boards are small and very bouncy and slippery. Used on a beach with the included bags is no fun!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lobisser

customer_reviews.title: LED lights are awesome-great vendor
customer_reviews.text: The bag ripped on the first pull but the vendor promptly sent me a new item. I was very impressed. The cornhole game has awesome led lights for dusk or dark that are the hit of the party. The boards are lightweight and durable, just a bit slippery. We owned a wood set before and it was a bit easier to keep the bags on the board. This item is easier for the kids to set up duearly to being lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Not a study his word versions but nice
customer_reviews.text: Easily portable and set up well. Service is very slick so bags move quite a bit on it. Not as sturdy as the heavy wood ones that you see online or in use.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as a wooden set
customer_reviews.text: The low price means lower quality in this case. It works just fine, but is a significant downgrade from a wooden set. The boards are noisy when the bean bags hit it and even leave the ground slightly due to the boards being so light. This is a bonus for portability, but not good for function.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Nice little portable Cornhole set
customer_reviews.text: Great little bags set and love the light around the holes. It is smaller than regulation sized boards and out of the box it has a lot of spring and slide. After several days of breaking it in, the bounce and slide was manageable. It is very portable and comes with a nifty carrying case. Must have for bag lovers that wants a portable bag set.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good and Sturdy game
customer_reviews.text: The whole set looks really well made. The metal frame has held up to about 50 games so far (all in the grass or slick surface), and no damage is visible at all. The bags are well made and I haven't see any loosening of the stitching so far. The only complaint I have is the play surface is extremely slick and hard to get through the holes unless you land the bag on the bottom 7 inches or so, otherwise it just sails right over the hole.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lampey

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to pack up and carry
customer_reviews.text: We are on Day 5 of use on a beach in Florida, and everyone loves this. Kids of all ages and adults have played several times a day and the bags are holding up to the heavy use. Several people have stopped by to ask where we got this because they have found products of lesser quality in local stores. This game was well worth the money because the interest level remains high days after we starting playing. It's easy to pack up and carry, and it is not very heavy. I highly recommend this product. It's well made and it is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Xlr8UrLyf

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but tough playability
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of the boards and the bags, but so far have been a little disappointed in how slick the boards are. If you land a bag on the board on your first toss and a few other bags bounce off it is almost a guarantee that your bag will slide off. Also, there's some flex in the middle so they get launched off the bounce quite often. I'm happy with the quality of the product so it gets 4 stars, but as far as playability goes I would probably purchase a different set if I were to do it all again.
customer_reviews.author: Justy

customer_reviews.title: Good for light & portable, but tricky to play...
customer_reviews.text: It is well-built for sure...but like others have said, it is hard to play on these boards. The bags constantly bounce and slide off the board. Games took a lot longer to play because of all the sliding. Thinking of using surfboard wax to add a little "tackiness" to the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Calantropio

customer_reviews.title: Great for Transportation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift and it is exactly what I hoped for. We ended setting it up on Christmas day to get some friendly competition going and everyone loved it. I was hesitant to go away from the traditional wood set but the ease of packing it up and transporting it with the case it came with was well worth it. I'll probably buy another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Miraclemike3

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful made with Patriotic Theme! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Super , well made product! My nieces and nephews were coming to visit. Purchased this patriotic themed game and used it around the pool.... a HUGE HIT! Lots of competitive fun! 👍🏻🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Lulu M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the portability!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set because it is light and portable. After reading reviews from other sets, I didn't want to go with a traditional wooden set because they are heavier, less portable and have a tendency to warp if they get wet. This set by GoSports is perfect for my use because I enjoy taking the game with me to tailgates, camping and outdoor parties. The LED lights work great and are nice to have when the competition extends into the evening. I also like the carrying bag that keeps the set together.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Fun challenge
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and convenient to transport with the included case. The lightness of the kit makes the playing surface very bouncy. This makes it an additional challenge combined with the slick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M Leal

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun for all the age groups of our family!
customer_reviews.text: I thought if would be fun to have a cornhole tournament for Thanksgiving while the turkey roasted! I got my set in record time...exactly when it was scheduled to arrive....Everything was exactly as described and the set was very sturdy and fun for my competitive crew!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a backyard party
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to setup, ready to use, the corn bags are heavy enough. The corn holes are light and our Son can bring it to his friend's house
customer_reviews.author: Viet T Dao

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game. I got tired of waiting for my husband to make one for us and this filled the bill. It's a little more slippery than a wooden one, but that gives me more of a chance against him as it seems to be more of a challenge for him!! Love it...The carrying case is also very handy..
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Made for a fun 4th of July!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert on the sport, but this is a great set. We've used it for about 8 games so far since receiving it and the set seems solidly built. The boards themselves feel very sturdy and the bean bags are constructed of a heavier material. I can't comment difference in size between this and an "official size", but this is exactly what we were looking for. The carry bag makes this a very portable set and we are looking forward to using at the beach this summer. We will also add some decals to this for our favorite football teams to finish it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: High quality corh hole game
customer_reviews.text: The boards are made from sturdy aluminum and the artwork is great! Heavy duty bean bags too. So much for fun for the family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: RayRaysMomma

customer_reviews.title: We love this
customer_reviews.text: We used this a ton last summer and we have been very happy with it. It is nice to have everything in a travel bag too! We ended up picking up a score board/drink holder to go along with this. That was the only thing that we didn't get with this game set. The game is soild. Because it is metal it does play differntly than a home made board. However, we have had a ton of fun with it at our house and on the road. I would suggest picking this up. It is nice that it doesn't take up a ton of space when we have it stored away.
customer_reviews.author: FluffyFingersMD

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun!
customer_reviews.text: We are having so much fun playing with this CornHole set. The surface material is very nice, something I haven't seen on other sets we've used in the past. The metal 'feet' do slide when they are on a hard surface but not too much. A great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good set; a little bouncy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solid set. We had a block party with adults and kids playing. I saw a couple of 5-6 year old kids walk on it. But I knew it wouldn't break. Our last set fell apart after a year or so of use by our kids. I do agree with previous commenters regarding the bounce of the board though. I'm not an avid corn hole player. So when I saw the comments that the bags bounce a little too much when they hit, I thought "corn hole snobs". But there's definitely too much bounce and slide. It's better on a lawn than a sidewalk or pavement. Overall we are happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: golden

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. I hope the black top holds up, but I love the lightweight frame and ease of the legs. I have hauled those heavy wood ones before and they are heavy and a pain to take places. I really like this one is light weight and easy to set up. The bean bags are full size and very durable. Very impressed with the whole game.
customer_reviews.author: LawnLady

customer_reviews.title: The boards are slick so the bags slide very easily. I appreciated having the rules included as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to donate to my local American Legion for a prize to the winner of our Corn Hold Tournament....I hadn't played in a couple of years but ended up winning my donation. The boards are slick so the bags slide very easily. I appreciated having the rules included as it made setting them up the correct distance a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, quality item, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This game set is sturdy, well-built and loads of fun. GoSports also has excellent customer service, I contacted them because we were missing a beanbag from the set and they immediately sent out the missing items complete with tracking number. I would not hesitate to buy from them again. If you were looking for this type of lawn game you can't beat the quality and customer service of GoSports
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy so bags bounce off. Other than that ok quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to transport. I've customized mine with my teams logos and it looks as good as the ones that cost $50-$100 bucks more. They are light weight though and would recommend weighted them down on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tippie

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They are a tiny bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are a tiny bit flimsy, but I just make sure to be cautious with them and definitely not leave them outside. The lights are super bright and perfect for playing at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly and in perfect condition. The game is sturdy and will be ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and in perfect condition. The game is sturdy and will be easy to transport if we want to take our bean bag toss show on the road! The flag design is fun and festive; the boards are well constructed. When you set them up on a hard surface, such as pavers or concrete, the boards do bounce a bit upon impact when the bean bags are tossed. This is not an issue on a lawn. We solved the problem by placing a dumbbell over the bracing bar to weight the board down a bit while in use. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Decent but came defective
customer_reviews.text: The boards look great and seem to be sturdy. We just got them today. There is a problem with the battery encasements. We openned them to put batteries in right away and the bolts came off. It is almost impossible to put them back in so we mighy have to tape the covers shut. I am very diddapointed as I expected a better quality and not something that broke right away.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: LED lights, easy set-up and Cornhole fun
customer_reviews.text: We chose this Cornhole set for two reasons. It’s relatively light weight so we can easily set it up and then put away again. And second for the LED lights which make it fun to play at night. For us this is a multi-generational (from 70s-10 years old) game that we all enjoy and play no matter our Cornhole scoring ‘abilities’.
customer_reviews.author: Pfarr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The item was exactly as I had anticipated based on the pictures and description. Great for my kids to play with. If you're looking for boards for adults or serious cornholers, this one probably isn't it, however.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Key

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is our first Corn Hole purchase and we love it. Looked at all the reviews, comparisons between wood and metal and felt really good buying this one. It's a little smaller than "regulation" but we don't really know the difference, we just play in the back yard!! Love the carrying case, plan on bringing it to our annual camping trip to Mammouth. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: mskl

customer_reviews.title: Trampolie hole?
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice set and as advertised they are light. However, I think that is why there is so much bounce. Not only do the bag bounce off the surface (3"), the boards themselves bounce and change position while playing. We played in the grass and at the campsite which was dirt. Still bounced. They may not bounce in you are playing in sand. But, if you like playing on wooden cornhole boards you will NOT like this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jae & Victory

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, but not too heavy. It fits very nicely in the carrying bag. Beats lugging a huge wood set around. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tiller

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a fan. It's cheaply made and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan. It's cheaply made and I feels as if it will fall apart with every toss. The bag slides off and makes the game not worth the time to take it out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: mommyto3

customer_reviews.title: Best set ever
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten so much use out of this cornhole set - I bought it for when I have crawfish boils at my house, and everyone loves playing it. Very high quality and good construction - it is much more heavy-duty than I expected. I like how it all packs up, but be aware that it's a pretty large set to carry around with you; we brought it to the beach last week and loved having it, but hauling it about a half-mile to/from the car was tedious. Still, if you're looking for a casual outdoor source of fun, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Fulwiler

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, not weather proof, not durable.
customer_reviews.text: After one month of use, both the bean bags and the corn hole boards are deteriorating beyond usable condition. We play a few times a week and are down to only 3 bags left and the paper coating that covers the corn hole boards is peeling off from all directions.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

product_meta.title: GoSports Cornhole Bean Bag Toss Game Set - Superior Aluminum Frame (American Flag, Football, LED and Classic designs)
product_meta.description: The GoSports Tailgate Cornhole game was designed to provide for a superior Cornhole experience by maximizing durability, portability and game quality. The 3' x 2' boards are our most popular size and are perfect for all ages and abilities. How are the GoSports Cornhole games different? Aluminum Frame Construction: Very sturdy, yet lightweight – much better quality than steel, foam board or other mystery materials. 8 All-Weather Duck Cloth Bags – these bags are the real deal - not the cheap sand filled bags other companies use that feel like bricks. Our set also includes a carrying case for easy portability/storage. Manufacturer's Note: We stand behind our products 100%, so if you have any quality issues, please contact us so we can fix the problem right away. Thank you for choosing GoSports.
feature_bullets: TAILGATE SIZE: Full cornhole set includes 2 tailgate size (3 feet x 2 feet) cornhole boards, 8 all weather regulation bean bags, premium carrying case, and rules
EVENT DAY FAVORITE: Hours of fun with friends and family at tailgates, holiday weekends, cookouts, campsites, and more
STURDY DESIGN: Features composite MDF surface with high strength aluminum frame that is durable for play yet lightweight for portability
ALL WEATHER BEAN BAGS: Complete set of 8 regulation size (6 inch x 6 inch) bean bags (4 red + 4 blue)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
